translations: 透露，暗示；宣布，通告（intimate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He has already intimated (that) he intends to retire.
sentences.translation: 他已经暗示他打算退休。

sentences.sentence: He has already intimated to us his intention to retire.
sentences.translation: 他已经向我们透露了他要退休的打算。

sentences.sentence: The reporter intimated to me that he would publish the story.
sentences.translation: 这位记者向我暗示他将发表这篇文章。
